title: The Scream
description: A couple buy a house they discover is haunted by the scream of a woman in agony.While out one day Mr Selincourt hears a strange story which causes him to rush home as quick as he can.

title: The Clock
description: Two children find a secret room in a huge house which has a strange clock. The clock has only one hand.

title: Dialogue with Two Faces
description: Two young strangers bump into each other at a house that is for sale. Both determined to buy it, both for different reasons.

title: The Surgeon
description: A surgeon discovers that he is going to be operating on his wife's lover.

title: Take a Number
description: George Bailey is normally a calm man who never gets angry, one day a wrongly dialed phone number changes all that.

title: Thought to Kill
description: Gribble has to contend with the wrath of his girl-friend when he breaks a date to work late.Its during that evening at work he spots an opportunity to make a fortune, but someone may have to die for it.

title: The Last Moment
description: Hard drinking Daniel O'Driscoll is persuaded to give up the bottle by a visiting lecturer. Surprisingly his family are not happy about his decision.

title: The Parlour Trick
description: Arthur's skill at slicing meat in the grocery store where he works suddenly causes a major crisis in the small town where he lives.

title: Outpost
description: A young scientist is at first grateful for the guide he is given to show him to his new isolated posting in the mountains.However this later turns to alarm when his guide shows signs of manic depression with suicidal tendencies.

title: A Lodging for the Night
description: After pleading innocence Villon is offered refuge from the searching authorities by an old soldier.During the night an incident causes the soldier to regret his decision. Villon has until the morning light to prove he is an honest man.

title: A Priceless Pocket
description: Generous but broke Henry Popple suddenly finds he always has a pound note in his pocket.

title: The Red Dress
description: Megan buys a new dress and goes on holiday after her husband is missing presumed dead in a mining accident.She meets Ted who helps her enjoy life again.However courtesy of the dress, her miserable first marriage comes back to haunt her.

title: The Heel
description: A man from Texas arrives at a shipping office with an old letter. Had Morgan (a partner in the office) known what was in it earlier it would have changed his life.

title: Moment of Truth
description: A famous bullfighter faces shame and financial ruin after he looses his nerve. Through love a rich and beautiful American girl offers him a way out.

title: The Silent Snow
description: A woman is waiting in a isolated snow bound cabin. She is suppose to be meeting her lover and he is the only one who knows she is there.

title: Panic
description: Fred Waldman has set a time bomb to go off in the night at his workplace, but on his way home he gets a nasty surprise.

title: Gramma Brenn
description: A family wants to exploit the celebrity opportunities of having a 105 year old relative. But the old woman just wants to be left in peace and quiet.

title: The Trap
description: A young couple struggling to live on a low income suddenly bump into an old friend who gives them a new prospective on life.

title: Leave to Die
description: Martha reflects on her life as she awaits in her prison cell.

title: Johnny Blue
description: Down and out trumpeter Johnny Blue is offered the chance to play a mysterious trumpet with a warning that he must never hit the highest note or the world will suffer.

title: The Happy McBains
description: The very happy McBains put on an act for others that they are an arguing,sour couple. However their new neighbors become concerned as they take the act rather too seriously.

title: The Awakening
description: A minor bureaucratic functionary in a soulless totalitarian regime is ashamed of his tattered overcoat. He scrimps to save money for a new one, and the new one changes his life. He is suddenly respected, admired, and valued, and when the new coat is stolen, his life becomes worse than it was before. He goes against the bureaucracy in hopes of getting the government to help him get his coat, and discovers that he can no longer accept the world he lives in as it is.

title: Man Who Heard Everything
description: After an accident Charlie finds his powers of hearing have miraculously increased to a point that he is hearing things he does not want to hear.

title: Silent Night: The Story of the Original Christmas Carol
Border Incident
description: Three characters all desperately looking for a way out bump into each other.

title: The Long White Line
description: Grace, a devoted nurse of many years,receives a doctor's report that turns her life upside down.

title: Pitfall
description: Prentiss thinks he has rescued Patricia from a cad in Monte Carlo,but comes to realize she is quite capable of taking care of herself.

title: The Thoroughbred
description: An down-on-his-luck race handicapper touts a beautiful American into buying losing thoroughbred but changes heart and tries to train it to be a winner.

title: Goodbye Tomorrow
description: Sam Harper finds an unpublished manuscript by a long dead writer and decides to pass it off as his own.He finds his new found fame a double edged sword as he attracts a ghostly female companion.

title: Big Nick
description: When an ex American gangster retires to his native Italy he finds its not that easy to escape from his past.

title: Atlantic Night
description: An incident aboard the Titanic during its fateful journey.

title: The Immigrant
description: A Polish man plans to jump ship as it reaches London and make a new life.However on board the ship there might be someone who will thwart his plans and report him to the authorities.Konrad ponders on who that might be?

title: A Walk in the Wilderness
description: Handsome Canadian pilot Hugh Ross gets badly injured and facially burned during a test flight.His injuries are being treated and plastic surgery will help restore his face, but he is reluctant to see his pretty wife again.

title: Ship Day
description: A small island always welcomes the day when the ship arrives with goods, but on this particular day they need a doctor.

title: Beloved Stranger
description: Claire is told she only has a short time to live. She calls her husband and best friend to her side and says they should marry after as she can see they are growing attached to each other. Then comes news about a drug from Canada which can cure her.

title: The Last Tour
description: Julia sacrificed everything to be a success in Hollywood, on returning to home to Hamburg she is offered second rate work in Munich , she does not need to take it... but Munich is the home of her estranged husband and daughter.

title: Bulldog Drummond and 'The Ludlow Affair'
description: Bulldog Drummond is contacted by a Mrs Harriet Ludlow, wife of an old friend; her husband has invented a new antibiotic formula potentially worth a fortune, but he has been kidnapped and held for ransom. Drummond sets out to prevent the formula from reaching the hands of the villains -- with or without his client's co-operation!
